name: #CarpeDiem
description:
The topic of the game jam was the nineties... Hence we decided to make a game set in 1492. The century wasn't specified ;) In the game, you are Christopher Columbus, who is going through his epic journey to America.

Although the game is about Columbus, it does have some 1990's elements in it. It is inspired by the games of our childhood, played on the Brick Game E-9999 console and has some 90's references.

The only controlling device one needs to play it is a mouse, since we wanted to make it mobile-friendly (so we can remake it for mobile platforms in the future).

Authors:

Joanna Kamelska "Aschau"

Filip Stolarczuk "Fifka"

Mateusz Roszkowski "Rożek"
